main event: A witness in Cincinnati, Ohio observed a bright red object in the sky that appeared to explode and move up and away toward the west on October 6, 1967.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 15 minutes.
The object appeared to move up and away toward the west before disappearing.
Other similar UFO reports were received from the Cincinnati area around the same time.
The witness compared the brightness of the object to a very bright star.
The witness estimated the object was around 3,500 feet away.
